name: Time-saver Breakfast Casserole
description: Often served Christmas morning, this family favourite is an ideal make-ahead recipe for Easter or Mother's Day. Prep the night before and pop it in the oven next morning. Also a great breakfast-for-dinner dish.

ingredients.name: Canadian back bacon, or 8 large slices ham

preparation: Generously butter a large casserole dish. Arrange 8 bread slices in bottom (overlapping is fine). Cover with bacon and lay cheddar overtop. Cover with remaining bread slices.

In a bowl, whisk eggs with milk, 3 Onion Dip Mix, red pepper, mustard powder, Worcestershire sauce and generous grindings of Salt and Pepper. Pour over casserole. Cover with plastic and refrigerate overnight.
Uncover casserole and drizzle with butter. Sprinkle cornflakes overtop. Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, until set. Let stand for 10 minutes, then cut into squares and serve.
